00160 enum ErrorCode {
00161     /* Internal errors to rdkafka: */
00163     ERR__BEGIN = -200,
00165     ERR__BAD_MSG = -199,
00167     ERR__BAD_COMPRESSION = -198,
00169     ERR__DESTROY = -197,
00171     ERR__FAIL = -196,
00173     ERR__TRANSPORT = -195,
00175     ERR__CRIT_SYS_RESOURCE = -194,
00177     ERR__RESOLVE = -193,
00179     ERR__MSG_TIMED_OUT = -192,
00182     ERR__PARTITION_EOF = -191,
00184     ERR__UNKNOWN_PARTITION = -190,
00186     ERR__FS = -189,
00188     ERR__UNKNOWN_TOPIC = -188,
00190     ERR__ALL_BROKERS_DOWN = -187,
00192     ERR__INVALID_ARG = -186,

00196     ERR__QUEUE_FULL = -184,

00200         ERR__NODE_UPDATE = -182,

00208         ERR__IN_PROGRESS = -178,
00210         ERR__PREV_IN_PROGRESS = -177,

00220         ERR__STATE = -172,

00224         ERR__NOT_IMPLEMENTED = -170,
00226     ERR__AUTHENTICATION = -169,
00228     ERR__NO_OFFSET = -168,
00230     ERR__OUTDATED = -167,

00234         ERR__UNSUPPORTED_FEATURE = -165,
00236         ERR__WAIT_CACHE = -164,
00238         ERR__INTR = -163,

00252         ERR__NOENT = -156,
00254         ERR__UNDERFLOW = -155,
00255 
00257     ERR__END = -100,
00258 
00259     /* Kafka broker errors: */
00261     ERR_UNKNOWN = -1,
00263     ERR_NO_ERROR = 0,

00544     EVENT_SEVERITY_NOTICE = 5,
00545     EVENT_SEVERITY_INFO = 6,
00546     EVENT_SEVERITY_DEBUG = 7
00547   };

00550

00786 class RD_EXPORT Conf {
00787  public:
00791   enum ConfType {
00792     CONF_GLOBAL, 
00793     CONF_TOPIC   
00794   };
00795 
00799   enum ConfResult {
00800     CONF_UNKNOWN = -2,  
00801     CONF_INVALID = -1,  
00802     CONF_OK = 0         
00803   };
00804 
00805 
00809   static Conf *create (ConfType type);
00810 
00811   virtual ~Conf () { }
00812 
00826   virtual Conf::ConfResult set (const std::string &name,
00827                                 const std::string &value,
00828                                 std::string &errstr) = 0;
00829 
00831   virtual Conf::ConfResult set (const std::string &name,
00832                                 DeliveryReportCb *dr_cb,
00833                                 std::string &errstr) = 0;
00834 
00836   virtual Conf::ConfResult set (const std::string &name,
00837                                 EventCb *event_cb,
00838                                 std::string &errstr) = 0;
00839 
00847   virtual Conf::ConfResult set (const std::string &name,
00848                                 const Conf *topic_conf,
00849                                 std::string &errstr) = 0;
00850 
00852   virtual Conf::ConfResult set (const std::string &name,
00853                                 PartitionerCb *partitioner_cb,
00854                                 std::string &errstr) = 0;
00855 
00857   virtual Conf::ConfResult set (const std::string &name,
00858                                 PartitionerKeyPointerCb *partitioner_kp_cb,
00859                                 std::string &errstr) = 0;
00860 
00862   virtual Conf::ConfResult set (const std::string &name, SocketCb *socket_cb,
00863                                 std::string &errstr) = 0;
00864 
00866   virtual Conf::ConfResult set (const std::string &name, OpenCb *open_cb,
00867                                 std::string &errstr) = 0;
00868 
00870   virtual Conf::ConfResult set (const std::string &name,
00871                                 RebalanceCb *rebalance_cb,
00872                                 std::string &errstr) = 0;
00873 
00875   virtual Conf::ConfResult set (const std::string &name,
00876                                 OffsetCommitCb *offset_commit_cb,
00877                                 std::string &errstr) = 0;
00878 
00890   virtual Conf::ConfResult get(const std::string &name,
00891       std::string &value) const = 0;
00892 
00896   virtual Conf::ConfResult get(DeliveryReportCb *&dr_cb) const = 0;
00897 
00901   virtual Conf::ConfResult get(EventCb *&event_cb) const = 0;
00902 
00906   virtual Conf::ConfResult get(PartitionerCb *&partitioner_cb) const = 0;
00907 
00911   virtual Conf::ConfResult get(PartitionerKeyPointerCb *&partitioner_kp_cb) const = 0;
00912 
00916   virtual Conf::ConfResult get(SocketCb *&socket_cb) const = 0;
00917 
00921   virtual Conf::ConfResult get(OpenCb *&open_cb) const = 0;
00922 
00926   virtual Conf::ConfResult get(RebalanceCb *&rebalance_cb) const = 0;
00927 
00931   virtual Conf::ConfResult get(OffsetCommitCb *&offset_commit_cb) const = 0;
00932 
00935   virtual std::list<std::string> *dump () = 0;
00936 
00938   virtual Conf::ConfResult set (const std::string &name, ConsumeCb *consume_cb,
00939                 std::string &errstr) = 0;
00940 };

00954 class RD_EXPORT Handle {
00955  public:
00956   virtual ~Handle() { }
00957 
00959   virtual const std::string name () const = 0;
00960 
00969   virtual const std::string memberid () const = 0;
00970 
00971 
00994   virtual int poll (int timeout_ms) = 0;
00995 
01002   virtual int outq_len () = 0;
01003 
01019   virtual ErrorCode metadata (bool all_topics, const Topic *only_rkt,
01020                               Metadata **metadatap, int timeout_ms) = 0;
01021 
01022 
01032   virtual ErrorCode pause (std::vector<TopicPartition*> &partitions) = 0;
01033 
01034 
01044   virtual ErrorCode resume (std::vector<TopicPartition*> &partitions) = 0;
01045 
01046 
01055   virtual ErrorCode query_watermark_offsets (const std::string &topic,
01056                          int32_t partition,
01057                          int64_t *low, int64_t *high,
01058                          int timeout_ms) = 0;
01059 
01077   virtual ErrorCode get_watermark_offsets (const std::string &topic,
01078                        int32_t partition,
01079                        int64_t *low, int64_t *high) = 0;
01080 
01081 
01101   virtual ErrorCode offsetsForTimes (std::vector<TopicPartition*> &offsets,
01102                                      int timeout_ms) = 0;
01103 
01104 
01113   virtual Queue *get_partition_queue (const TopicPartition *partition) = 0;
01114 
01131   virtual ErrorCode set_log_queue (Queue *queue) = 0;
01132 
01144   virtual void yield () = 0;
01145 
01160   virtual const std::string clusterid (int timeout_ms) = 0;
01161 
01178   virtual struct rd_kafka_s *c_ptr () = 0;
01179 };

01992 class RD_EXPORT Producer : public virtual Handle {
01993  public:
02004   static Producer *create (Conf *conf, std::string &errstr);
02005 
02006 
02007   virtual ~Producer () = 0;
02008 
02014   enum {
02015     RK_MSG_FREE = 0x1, 
02017     RK_MSG_COPY = 0x2, 
02021     RK_MSG_BLOCK = 0x4  
02038   /* For backwards compatibility: */
02039 #ifndef MSG_COPY /* defined in sys/msg.h */
02040     , 
02043     MSG_FREE = RK_MSG_FREE,
02044     MSG_COPY = RK_MSG_COPY
02045 #endif
02046 
02047   };
02048 
02105   virtual ErrorCode produce (Topic *topic, int32_t partition,
02106                              int msgflags,
02107                              void *payload, size_t len,
02108                              const std::string *key,
02109                              void *msg_opaque) = 0;
02110 
02115   virtual ErrorCode produce (Topic *topic, int32_t partition,
02116                              int msgflags,
02117                              void *payload, size_t len,
02118                              const void *key, size_t key_len,
02119                              void *msg_opaque) = 0;
02120 
02127   virtual ErrorCode produce (const std::string topic_name, int32_t partition,
02128                              int msgflags,
02129                              void *payload, size_t len,
02130                              const void *key, size_t key_len,
02131                              int64_t timestamp,
02132                              void *msg_opaque) = 0;
02133 
02134 
02139   virtual ErrorCode produce (Topic *topic, int32_t partition,
02140                              const std::vector<char> *payload,
02141                              const std::vector<char> *key,
02142                              void *msg_opaque) = 0;
02143 
02144 
02156   virtual ErrorCode flush (int timeout_ms) = 0;
02157 };
02158 
02172 class BrokerMetadata {
02173  public:
02175   virtual int32_t id() const = 0;
02176 
02178   virtual const std::string host() const = 0;
02179 
02181   virtual int port() const = 0;
02182 
02183   virtual ~BrokerMetadata() = 0;

02252 class Metadata {

02260   typedef BrokerMetadataVector::const_iterator BrokerMetadataIterator;
